component.name: XIVTCLauncher
component.summary: Custom launcher for FFXIV Taiwan on Linux

description.p: XIVTCLauncher is a custom launcher for FFXIV Taiwan that offers painless patching, a customized WINE version for perfect compatibility with the game, Dalamud plugin support via yanmucorp, and seamless Steam Deck integration. Based on XIVLauncher.Core.
